original_text: Howbeit there was no reckoning made with them of the money that was delivered into their hand, because they dealt faithfully.
korean_text: 그러나 그들의 손에 맡긴 은을 회계하지 말지니 이는 그들이 진실하게 행함이니라

sentences.original_text: Howbeit there was no reckoning made with them
of the money that was delivered into their hand
